intro: Psychotria havilandii, commonly known as the "Haviland's Psychotria," is a species of flowering plant native to the tropical regions of Central and South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its dark green, glossy leaves and clusters of small, white or pale pink flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in lowland rainforests. Psychotria havilandii is also known for its medicinal properties and has been used in traditional herbal remedies.
